We therefore do not offer any courses at the University of Potsdam any more.My research interests are in machine learning and computational data analysis. In addition to developing novel methods and studying their statistical and algorithmic properties, we also work on different application problems. We currently focus on applications of machine learning to agricultural and bioeconomic production systems. I have also worked in joint projects with partners from industry, for example on targeting marketing, IT-security, and the evaluation of ranking models in information retrieval, and with researchers in psychology (models of human eye movements) and geophysics (seismic hazard analysis).
